title: Diamond no Ace: Second Season OVA
original_name: ダイヤの A[エース]～ Second Season OAD ～
opening_song: "Sora ga Aozora de aru Tame ni (空が青空であるために)" by GLAY
ending_song: "BRAND NEW BLUE" by Eijun Sawamura (Ryota Osaka) featuring Masayoshi Oishi
sinopse:
OVAs bundled with 4th and 5th manga volumes of Diamond no Ace Act II.

An epilogue of the Diamond no Ace series.
